Barack Obama has pledged to freeze non-defense discretionary spending and Republicans have said they want to continue at 2008 spending levels. reports: A group of conservatives led by former Kansas Rep. Jim Ryun plan to start an independent expenditure campaign aimed at getting Rep. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) to run for president. "America's President Committee" will begin a signature-gathering effort this week to encourage Mike Pence to get into the presidential race. Their website, www.theconservativechampion.org, will go live Monday. Mike Pence has gotten buzz
